---
  title: "Join Us"
---

  There are multiple ways to get involved with the ASA BIOP SWE WG:
  
  * Join as a member, who attends the ASA BIOP SWE WG meetings.
  
  * Join as a task force member, who actively contributes to one or several task force(s).
  
  If you are interested to join the ASA BIOP SWE WG, please contact us:
  [Daniel Sabanes Bove](mailto:daniel.sabanes_bove@roche.com) or [Ya Wang](mailto:ya.wang10@gilead.com)
